value:
Gold is gold. It doesn't matter where
it comes from when you're in need.
It's how you feed your family...

You can't simply remain underground
if you want to see love and justice
in the world.

A plague nearly ended my life...
Do your best to keep warm and
dry—stay rested and healthy.

You have a scrap heap here? Can you
take me to it? Scrap is a great way to
learn about the people who tossed it.$k$pAnd sometimes you can find some
good stuff too.

Are you following me or something?
Well...nothing to see here. I'm out
running a few errands. That's all...

Nice to meet you. I'm Yuri, here on
behalf of $Nf.$k$pI've got a gift for you. Here.

I can't be caught. Even my name is
a disguise. My enemies just end up
chasing my shadow. That's how it is.

I am not some dog that wags his tail
and begs for scraps... I'd bite through
my chains and kick open my cage!

That's how it is, is it? Time to switch
things up then.

So long as our efforts are aligned,
I'll happily work alongside you.

Shocked? Like anyone else has looks
like mine... I'm Yuri—but you already
know that. Anyway, see ya around.

Most of my comrades will do what
I ask with little wheedling... But you
people here are all even easier marks.$k$pNot that I'm scheming. Though,
of course, I'm not above a little
villainy if it's for my family.$k$pThat's the code I live by.$k$p...I can spot a person's weakness
from a glance. Even if they mask it,
people are essentially selfish.$k$pThat's why we're stronger together,
with our friends—when you have
others to lean on.$k$pI have friends like that back home.$k$pI remember them in the light of the
mornings there. It was always warm,
and everything was beautiful...$k$pYou and I are going to have a long
friendship too. I've already decided
to stick around. It'll be good!
You're gonna love this.
Too little too late.
Really?
Got a death wish, friend?
Guess that's it...
Me, a legendary hero? Well, fancy that.
Uh, watch it with the hands, friend.
Folks must have really talked me up over the years, if I'm some kind of legend.
Put me on a pedestal if you insist. I'm not gonna let it go to my head.
What is it that's legendary about me, exactly? Apart from my pretty face, obviously.
If nothing else, I'm glad that all I've done wasn't for nothing.
Hungry? I could whip something up for you.
Sure.
Give an order.
I'll handle this.
